OpenAI sells weapons to its own enemies. Every day, thousands of startups build on OpenAI's API, many trying to compete directly with ChatGPT. It's the ultimate platform paradoxã€‚

The models themselves are becoming anti-disintermediation technology. You can't abstract them awayã€‚

Pricing is kind of like a one-way ratchet. And like, basically, once you get a taste of usage-based pricing, you're never going to go back to like the per seat... pricingã€‚
